verses.verse: It is<WG4851> doubtless<WG1211> not<WG3756> profitable<WG4851> for me<WG3427> to boast.<WG2744> For<WG1063> I will come<WG2064> to<WG1519> visions<WG3701> and<WG2532> revelations<WG602> of the Lord.<WG2962>

<WG2532> I know<WG1492> such<WG5108> a man<WG444> (whether<WG1535> in<WG1722> the body,<WG4983> or<WG1535> outside<WG1622> of the body,<WG4983> I<WG1492> don't<WG3756> know;<WG1492> God<WG2316> knows<WG1492>),

how<WG3754> he was caught up<WG726> into<WG1519> Paradise,<WG3857> and<WG2532> heard<WG191> unspeakable<WG731> words,<WG4487> which<WG3739> it is<WG1832> not<WG3756> lawful<WG1832> for a man<WG444> to utter.<WG2980>

On behalf of<WG5228> such a one<WG5108> I will boast,<WG2744> but<WG1161> on<WG5228> my<WG1683> own behalf I will<WG2744> not<WG3756> boast,<WG2744> except<WG1487> <WG3361> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> weaknesses.<WG769>

For<WG1063> if<WG1437> I would desire<WG2309> to boast,<WG2744> I will<WG2071> not<WG3756> be<WG2071> foolish;<WG878> for<WG1063> I will speak<WG2046> the truth.<WG225> But<WG1161> I refrain,<WG5339> so that<WG3361> no man<WG5100> may think<WG3049> more<WG5228> of<WG1519> me<WG1691> than that which<WG3739> he sees<WG991> in me,<WG3165> or<WG2228> hears<WG191><WG99999> from<WG1537> me.<WG1700>

<WG2532> By<WG3361> reason<WG5236> of the exceeding greatness<WG5236> of the revelations,<WG602> that I should not be exalted excessively,<WG5229> there was given<WG1325> to me<WG3427> a thorn<WG4647> in the flesh,<WG4561> a messenger<WG32> of Satan<WG4566> to<WG2443> torment<WG2852> me,<WG3165> that<WG2443> I should not<WG3361> be exalted excessively.<WG5229>
Concerning<WG5228> this thing,<WG5127> I begged<WG3870> the Lord<WG2962> three<WG5151> times that<WG2443> it might depart<WG868> from<WG575> me.<WG1700>

<WG2532> He has said<WG2046> to me,<WG3427> "My<WG3450> grace<WG5485> is sufficient<WG714> for you,<WG4671> for<WG1063> my<WG3450> power<WG1411> is made perfect<WG5048> in<WG1722> weakness.<WG769>" Most gladly<WG2236> therefore<WG3767> I<WG2744> will rather<WG3123> glory<WG2744> in<WG1722> my<WG3450> weaknesses,<WG769> that<WG2443> the power<WG1411> of Christ<WG5547> may rest<WG1981> on<WG1909> me.<WG1691>

Therefore<WG1352> I take pleasure<WG2106> in<WG1722> weaknesses,<WG769> in<WG1722> injuries,<WG5196> in<WG1722> necessities,<WG318> in<WG1722> persecutions,<WG1375> in<WG1722> distresses,<WG4730> for<WG5228> Christ<WG5547>'s sake. For<WG1063> when<WG3752> I am weak,<WG770> then<WG5119> am I<WG1510> strong.<WG1415>

I have become<WG1096> foolish<WG878> in<WG2744> boasting.<WG2744> You<WG5210> compelled<WG315> me,<WG3165> for<WG1063> I<WG1473> ought<WG3784> to have been commended<WG4921> by you,<WG5216> for<WG1063> in nothing<WG3762> was I inferior<WG5302> to the very<WG5228> best<WG3029> apostles,<WG652> though<WG1487> <WG2532> I am<WG1510> nothing.<WG3762>

Truly<WG3303> the signs<WG4592> of an apostle<WG652> were worked<WG2716> among<WG1722> you<WG5213> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> patience,<WG5281> in<WG1722> signs<WG4592> and<WG2532> wonders<WG5059> and<WG2532> mighty works.<WG1411>

For<WG1063> what<WG5101> is<WG2076> there in which<WG3739> you were made inferior<WG2274> to<WG5228> the rest<WG3062> of the assemblies,<WG1577> unless<WG1487> <WG3361> it is that<WG3754> I<WG3361> myself<WG846> was<WG2655> not<WG3756> a burden<WG2655> to you?<WG5216> Forgive<WG5483> me<WG3427> this<WG3778> wrong.<WG93>

Behold,<WG2400> this is the third time<WG5154> I am<WG2192> ready<WG2093> to come<WG2064> to<WG4314> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> I will<WG2655> not<WG3756> be a burden<WG2655> to you;<WG5216> for<WG1063> I seek<WG2212> not<WG3756> your possessions,<WG5216> but<WG235> you.<WG5209> For<WG1063> the children<WG5043> ought<WG3784> not<WG3756> to save up<WG2343> for the parents,<WG1118> but<WG235> the parents<WG1118> for the children.<WG5043>

<WG1161> I<WG1473> will most gladly<WG2236> spend<WG1159> and<WG1161> be spent<WG1550> for<WG5228> <WG5590> your<WG5216> souls.<WG1487> If <WG2532> I love<WG25> you<WG5209> more abundantly,<WG4056> am I loved<WG25> the less?<WG2276>
But<WG1161> be it<WG1473> so,<WG2077> I<WG1473> did<WG2599> not<WG3756> myself burden<WG2599> you.<WG5209> But,<WG5225> being crafty,<WG3835> I caught<WG2983> you<WG5209> with deception.<WG1388>
Did<WG3361> I take advantage<WG4122> of<WG4314> you<WG5209> by<WG1223> anyone<WG5100> of them<WG846> whom<WG3739> I have sent<WG649> to you?<WG5209>

I exhorted<WG5103> Titus,<WG5103> and<WG2532> I sent<WG4882> the brother<WG80> with<WG4882> him.<WG3361> Did <WG5100> Titus<WG5103> take any advantage<WG4122> of you?<WG5209> Didn't<WG3756> we<WG4043> walk in the same<WG846> spirit?<WG4151> Didn't<WG3756> we walk in the same<WG846> steps?<WG2487>

Again,<WG3825> do you<WG1380> think that<WG3754> we are excusing ourselves<WG626> to you?<WG5213> In the sight<WG2714> of God<WG2316> we speak<WG2980> in<WG1722> Christ.<WG5547> But<WG1161> all things,<WG3956> beloved,<WG27> are for<WG5228> your<WG5216> edifying.<WG3619>

For<WG1063> I am afraid<WG5399> that<WG3381> by any means,<WG2064> when I come, I might<WG2147> find<WG2147> you<WG5209> not<WG3756> the way<WG3634> I want<WG2309> to,<WG2504> and that I<WG2504> might be found<WG2147> by you<WG5213> as<WG3634> you<WG5213> don't<WG3756> desire;<WG2309> that by any means there would be strife,<WG2054> jealousy,<WG2205> outbursts of anger,<WG2372> factions,<WG2052> slander,<WG2636> whisperings,<WG5587> proud<WG5450> thoughts,<WG181> riots;

that<WG3361> again<WG3825> when I come<WG2064> <WG3825> my<WG3450> God<WG2316> would humble<WG5013> me<WG3165> before<WG4314> you,<WG5209> and<WG2532> I would mourn<WG3996> for many<WG4183> of those who have<WG3340> sinned before<WG4258> now,<WG2532> and not<WG3361> repented<WG3340> of<WG1909> the uncleanness<WG167> and<WG2532> sexual immorality<WG4202> and<WG2532> lustfulness<WG766> which<WG3739> they committed.<WG4238>
